dublinCore.dc:title: 114 SRES 3 ATS: To elect Orrin G. Hatch, a Senator from the State of Utah, to be President pro tempore of the Senate of the United States.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. McConnell submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: To elect Orrin G. Hatch, a Senator from the State of Utah, to be President pro tempore of the Senate of the United States.

section.text: That Orrin G. Hatch, a Senator from the State of Utah, be, and he is hereby, elected President of the Senate pro tempore.
